titleStmt.title: The new prayers for K. William & Q. Mary; and prosperity to their arms both by sea and land, against the French King. Used by the people called Quakers.
titleStmt.author: Bleming, Jone.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Bunch in Holywell-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
